description: This Dart source file defines an AuthService class responsible for handling user authentication processes, including login, registration, JWT token storage, and retrieval, in a Flutter application. It interfaces with a REST API backend, manages secure storage of tokens, and provides utility methods for authentication state management.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class that manages user authentication, including login, registration, JWT token storage, and retrieval, for a Flutter application communicating with a REST API backend.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Attempts user login with provided email and password; stores JWT token upon successful login.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles user registration by submitting email and password to backend API.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks whether a JWT token is stored, indicating an authenticated user.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Deletes the stored JWT token, effectively logging out the user.

methods.name: getJwtToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored JWT token from secure storage.

methods.name: getAuthHeader
methods.description: Provides authorization headers with the stored JWT token for authenticated requests.
